name: Jormungand
description:
Description

It is a platform game demo that uses the principle of "space loop". You need to find a suitable perspective and open up the loop space.

In addition to the character, enemies and platforms can cross the edge of space. The combination of multiple elements builds this unique platform jumping puzzle game.

How to play

Move: "↑↓←→"

Jump: "Space"

Enter the looping space: Hold "J"

Recover the seeds: "K"

Language

Simplified Chinese

English
